text: Daniel Brands was the defending champion; however, he decided not to compete. Julian Reister won this tournament, beating Alessio di Mauro 2–6, 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Internazionali di Monza e Brianza - Singles Category:Internazionali di Monza E Brianza
title: 2011 Internazionali di Monza e Brianza – Singles
